name: Arkham in Wonderland
text:
簡單 / 普通
[skull]：-X，其中X等於場上[[Wonderland]]地點的數量(最多5)。
[elder_thing]：-2。如果你位於[[Wonderland]]地點，隨機丟棄1張手牌。
back_text:
困難 / 專家
[skull]：-X，其中X等於場上[[Wonderland]]地點的數量+1。
[elder_thing]：-3。如果你位於[[Wonderland]]地點，隨機丟棄1張手牌。

flavor: Strange waves of distortion sweep over Arkham, devolving it quickly into chaos. The city is rapidly being warped and blended with the Wonderland of Alice's dreams. Buildings and landmarks distort into unfamiliar forms, while the people unfortunate enough to be caught in these ripples are likewise distorted. You hope that you can find some way to stop or reverse these changes before you yourself are transformed by the events.
name: A Tide of Madness
back_flavor: The city is coming apart at the seams, while shadowy creatures further unravel it by consuming anything they can tear apart. Buildings collapse as their bricks turn into ivory dominoes, street lamps pop and blossom like daisies, and the very ground shifts like a rug on a polished floor. As distortions grow stronger, you wonder if the changes can possibly be reversed.
back_text: 選擇距離Arkham Asylum最近且非[[Wonderland]]的[[阿卡姆]]地點，將其翻面，翻到[[Wonderland]]面，並在其上放置1[per_investigator]個線索。該地點的每位調查員受到1點傷害和1點恐懼。如果場上每個[[阿卡姆]]地點都已經有[[Wonderland]]屬性，每位未撤退的調查員被擊敗，且受到1點肉體或精神創傷(自行選擇)。否則，將此密謀翻回'a'面。

flavor: You question the strange cat, but it speaks in circular logic and nonsensical terms. You get the feeling that it is testing you rather than helping you. If you want actual answers on how to stop Gurathnaka, you'll have to scour the city and watch the changes up-close.
name: Sphinx's Riddle
back_flavor: The cat appears again on a tree limb just above you, grinning as ever. "Truth is far more true when found than told," it purrs, "but the shadows are growing long. Don't you think it's time you went home? Not your home, of course, but Alice's. It's in the neighborhood, you see."
back_text: 將放在一邊的Abandoned House放置入場。調查員隊長必須立刻控制放在一邊的The Cheshire Cat(Grinning Guide)。將放在一邊的Cheshire Cat遭遇組洗入遭遇牌堆。

flavor: Amid the chaotic overlap of this other world, an English country house has appeared in the neighborhood just south of you. If what the cat suggested is true, then the key to stopping these worlds from merging lies inside.
name: House Sitting
text: 目標 - 在調查員進入Abandoned House後，推進場景。
back_flavor: You open the door to the quaint house and step inside hesitantly. The rooms are mostly bare, and what little furniture remains is covered with dusty white sheets. The whole search seems more futile by the moment until you enter a room whose only furnishing is a large mirror on the mantle above a fireplace. Curiously, the mirror's surface ripples intermittently, and through it you can see an entirely different room. As you approach for a closer look, the scratching of paws on the old wooden floor directs your attention back to the hall behind you. A white rabbit dressed in old Victorian clothing dashes away, clutching a pocket watch and mumbling to itself. You won't get a chance to investigate both before Arkham unravels completely.
back_text: 調查員必須選擇(以下一項)： - We have to find out what that rabbit is up to. 將放在一邊的The White Rabbit放置入場，放在Abandoned House。 推進到場景3a - Follow the White Rabbit。 - We have to figure out how to get inside that mirror. 將放在一邊的The Looking-Glass放置入場，放到Abandoned House。 推進到場景3a - Through the Looking-Glass。

flavor: The white rabbit seems to have the one thing you're looking for amid the constantly twisting landscape: purpose. If there's any method to this madness, you'll find it wherever the rabbit is headed.
name: Follow the White Rabbit
text: 目標 - 如果本場景上有至少3[per_investigator]個線索，推進場景。
back_flavor: Following the rabbit is no easy task. It moves rapidly through the unstable terrain without sparing a moment to notice you. You nearly lose track of it in a thick tangle of bushes, but finally catch a glimpse of the rabbit leaping down a hole. You approach the rabbit hole in exasperation, wondering how to proceed, but as you stand there, the hole slowly widens to a much larger and seemingly bottomless pit. You look to the cat for advice, but it merely grins, waiting for you to act. Foolish as it seems, you steel your nerves and leap into the pit.

flavor: If there's anything that's clear about the state of Arkham, it's that Wonderland is the source of it. If you're going to have any real chance of stopping the chaos, you'll have to get to that world through the mirror.
name: Through the Looking-Glass
text: 強制 - 當一輪結束時，如果地點上都沒有線索：在Abandoned House上放置1[per_investigator]個線索(從供應堆拿取)。 目標 - 在所有未被擊敗的調查員都已撤退後，推進場景。
back_flavor: You slowly begin to notice patterns in the distortions sweeping over 阿卡姆. There are moments when the boundaries between the two worlds weaken. You spend some time learning the rhythm and quirks of the distortions before returning to the abandoned house. With proper timing, you leap forward as the mirror's surface ripples, and you pass through it completely as if diving through water.

flavor: The asylum doesn't have the greatest track record of actually curing their patients. You hope that you won't have to leave Alice here for very long.
name: Arkham Asylum
text: [action]：治癒1點恐懼(每回合限制一次)。

flavor: Splotches of color and bizarre structures coil around the gothic building, pressing in on all sides and merging haphazardly. You can't hazard a guess at just what they might be.
name: Arkham Asylum
text: 強制 - 當一輪結束時，對位於Arkham Asylum的每位調查員造成1點恐懼。

flavor: The spacious square has few landmarks, due to its popularity as a meeting place, and is largely deserted in the early evening, leaving it wide open.
name: Independence Square
text: 位於Independence Square的調查員進行[[Shadow]]卡牌上的檢定或對抗[[Shadow]]卡牌時，+2技能值。

flavor: Dark trees twist upward out of the ground, transforming the open park into a dense tangle of forest. Their boughs mesh together as they grow, blotting out the glow of sunset.
name: Independence Square
text: 位於Independence Square的調查員進行[[Shadow]]卡牌上的檢定或對抗[[Shadow]]卡牌時，-2技能值。

flavor: The bank is nearing its closing hours. Citizens and tellers alike are hoping to hurry through their business, even without the jumbled mess blossoming around the building.
name: Bank of Arkham
text: [reaction]在你執行資源行動時：獲得1個額外的資源(每回合限制一次)。

flavor: The streets around the bank rise up jaggedly, cutting into the masonry and spreading like a forest fire. The shapes hardly seem natural, but branch off as if alive and growing.
name: Bank of Arkham
text: 位於Bank of Arkham的調查員不能獲得資源。

flavor: The Arkham Advertiser's staff are frantically at work, cataloguing the strange events sweeping over 阿卡姆. Few of their reporters have returned with information, if any.
name: Newspaper Office
text: [reaction]在你執行抽牌行動時：抽取1張額外的卡牌(每回合限制一次)。

flavor: The checkered tile floor of the newspaper office bends and spirals around you, while chess pieces slide in and around with chaotic, but deliberate motion in a whirling display.
name: Newspaper Office
text: 位於Newspaper Office的調查員不能抽取卡牌。

flavor: The shop of habitual oddities seems almost part of the mad transformations outside. The shop is silent but for the muted ticking of a clock on Oliver Thomas' desk.
name: Curiositie Shoppe
text: [action]花費1個資源：在你牌堆頂部6張卡牌中查找並抽取1張[[道具]]或[[法術]]卡牌。混洗你的牌堆。

flavor: The once-quiet ticking amplifies intensely as clock faces and ratcheting gears begin to bleed through the various display cases of the shop.
name: Curiositie Shoppe
text: 強制 - 當一輪結束時，位於Curiositie Shoppe的每位調查員丟棄其牌堆頂部的1張卡牌。如果該卡牌是弱點，抽取該卡。

flavor: Northside's train station buzzes with activity and excitement as the setting sun continue to lower. Though it was the first site of Alice's incident, it is currently furthest from its nexus.
name: Train Station
text: [reaction]在你將要打出支援時：該支援的費用降低1點(最少1點，每回合限制一次)。

flavor: As the city twists around you, so do the careful network of railway tracks flowing in and around the station. Boxcars and engines alike lift and begin to propel themselves on this rollercoaster formation.
name: Train Station
text: 強制 - 在你將要打出支援時：該支援的費用增加1點。

flavor: The house is almost entirely empty. It is strangely tranquil amid the chaos outside.
name: Abandoned House
back_flavor: You don't recall seeing a house at this spot before, or a house like this anywhere in Arkham at all, for that matter.
back_text: 只要Abandoned House的連接地點上有線索，你不能進入Abandoned House。

name: The White Rabbit
text: 強制 - 當一輪結束時，將The White Rabbit移動到沒有調查員的最近地點。 [reaction]在你進入The White Rabbit的地點時：檢定[intellect]或[agility](4)。你可以花費任意數量的線索，每花費1個線索，本次檢定+2技能值。如果你成功，在當前場景上放置1個線索(從供應堆拿取)。無論你成功或失敗，將The White Rabbit移動到沒有調查員的最近地點。

name: The Looking-Glass
text: [reaction]在你成功調查Abandoned House後：改為將你的1個線索放到The Looking-Glass上。 [action]從The Looking-Glass移除3個線索：撤退。你踏入鏡子之中。You step through the looking-glass.

name: Abandon Reason
text: 顯現 - 檢定[willpower](3)。如果你失敗，將Abandon Reason疊加到你的地點，並在其上放置1個毀滅標記。 強制 - 如果Abandon Reason上沒有毀滅標記，將其丟棄。 [action]受到1點恐懼：從Abandon Reason移除1個毀滅標記。

name: Distorting Influence
text: 顯現 - 如果你所在地點沒有疊加Distorting Influence，將Distorting Influence疊加到你所在地點。否則，其獲得湧動。 位於疊加的地點的調查員將其[willpower]和[intellect]的基礎值交換、[combat]和[agility]的基礎值交換。 [action]受到1點傷害：丟棄Distorting Influence。

name: Panicked Mob
text: 龐大。警戒。 強制 - 如果有線索被放到Panicked Mob所在地點，或Panicked Mob所在地點的調查員花費線索：在Panicked Mob放置1個毀滅標記。 [action]花費1個線索：談判。對Panicked Mob造成2點傷害。

name: Twisted Citizen
text: 生成 - 最多線索的地點。 獵物 - 線索最多的調查員。 如果Twisted Citizen所在地點沒有線索，其獲得獵手。 強制 - 當神話階段結束時，如果Twisted Citizen所在地點上有線索：在Twisted Citizen上放置1個毀滅標記。

flavor: The odd cake and drink caused you to grow and shrink whenever you used them. This could come in handy.
name: Strange Refreshments
text:
使用(4 portions)。如果Strange Refreshments沒有portions，將其丟棄。
[fast]消耗Strange Refreshments並花費1portion：你這次技能檢定+2[combat]或+2[agility]。

flavor: The booklet is filled with a series of strange but insightful poems, all written completely backward.
name: Looking-Glass Book
text:
使用(4 poems)。如果Looking-Glass Book沒有poems，將其丟棄。
[fast]消耗Looking-Glass Book並花費1poem：你這次技能檢定+2[willpower]或+2[intellect]。

name: A Sea of Troubles
text:
簡單 / 普通
[skull]：-1.如果你失敗，從你的地點移除1個牡蠣。
[cultist][tablet]：-3。如果你的地點上沒有牡蠣，改為-5。
[elder_thing]：-3。如果你失敗，受到1點恐懼。
back_text:
困難 / 專家
[skull]：-2.如果你失敗，從你的地點移除1個牡蠣。
[cultist][tablet]：-4。如果你的地點上沒有牡蠣，改為-6。
[elder_thing]：-4。如果你失敗，受到1點恐懼。

flavor: The quiet lapping of waves on the sand does little to calm your feeling of foreboding. Shadows flit in every wave, making you reluctant to enter the surf in search of the truth.
name: A Tide of Tears
back_flavor:
"Problems with the old country house, squire?" A disinterested carpenter approaches the White Rabbit and his partially demolished home, giving them both only a glance.
"Yes, yes, only hurry!" the rabbit pleads, tapping his foot.
"Easy does it, guv," the carpenter retorts, rubbing his stomach, "Job's as good as done, only I'm a mite peckish. I'll be back 'round once I've had a bite."
Further down the rocky coast, an enormous walrus lifts itself out of the surf. Its stomach growls like an earthquake as it looks out over the sea of tears. "Victuals abound. An oyster dinner seems the only solution," it rumbles to itself.
back_text: 將放在一邊的The Walrus生成在Tidal Pools。 將放在一邊的The Carpenter生成在White Rabbit's House。 將Walrus and Carpenter遭遇組的剩餘卡牌與遭遇棄牌堆洗入遭遇牌堆。

flavor: The two hungry figures make their way down the beach with the clear intent of devouring the oysters. With each bite, they seem to grow larger by inches at a time, and at the same time grow darker and more distorted.
name: Beginning the Feed
text: 強制 - 當神話階段結束時，移除場上所有卡牌上的所有毀滅標記。每移除1個毀滅標記，結算按順序最先可執行的選項1[per_investigator]次： - 從The Walrus或The Carpenter的地點移動1個牡蠣到該敵人上。 - 將The Walrus或The Carpenter向最近且有最多牡蠣的地點移動一次。 強制 - 如果地點上都沒有牡蠣，推進場景。
back_flavor: The Walrus and the Carpenter devour the oysters one by one with hardly a pause between them, towering over the beach as they grab oysters by ever-growing handfuls. As the pair gulps down the last of the poor creatures, shadows explode out of them, tearing their bodies to shreds and scoring the coast in the same way that the White Rabbit's house had been destroyed. You flee inland, barely evading the spreading darkness.
back_text: 由於目睹了可怕的事件，每位未被擊敗且未撤退的調查員受到1點精神創傷。 (→結局1)

flavor: You consider the Cheshire Cat's cryptic words carefully. The cat seemed to suggest not only that the monster that destroyed the White Rabbit's home was one of Gurathnaka's ilk, but also that the nearby oysters may somehow assist in finding and defeating it. If you can destroy this monster, perhaps the same can be done to Gurathnaka in time.
name: Search for the Eldest Oyster
text: 目標 - 如果場上所有地點總共有至少4[per_investigator]個牡蠣，調查員可以推進場景。
back_flavor: You work your way up and down the coast, but none of the shellfish seem to understand. Finally, one oyster in particular regards you more warily than the others. "You're a not part of Wonderland," it states coolly, "but neither are you one of the shadows. You must be another Alice." You do your best to explain the circumstances, and it nods itself slowly.
back_text: 選擇一位調查員，該調查員立刻控制放在一邊的The Eldest Oyster支援。

flavor: The oyster demands that you take it with you. "The shadows are hungry, like their master. And anything hungry can be baited. They crave things from your world, some of which have drifted in from the sea of tears." You get the idea pretty quickly to start collecting anything you can find from 阿卡姆
name: Gone Fishing
text: 目標 - 當一輪結束時，位於Rocky Outcropping的調查員可以花費所需數量的線索推進場景。
back_flavor: With the wise oyster's guidance, you gather a collection of random flotsam at a small ledge overlooking the sea of tears. "These items are not from Wonderland either," the oyster explains matter-of-factly, "and therefore must be from wherever you are from. The shadows crave things from your home, and with this many, you surely have enough to bait a hook." You tie the debris together and hurl it into the water on a line. No sooner has the cluster hit the water when an enormous shadowy figure erupts from the sea, consuming the objects in a single bite. Bill the lizard gives a terrified wail at the mere sight of the beast, and you do your best to keep him from fleeing as the monster emerges.
back_text: 查看冒險日誌。如果the investigators went down the rabbit hole,將放在一邊的Deep Lurker(Perilous Predator)生成在Rocky Outcropping。否則，將放在一邊的Deep Lurker(Ravenous Ravager)生成在Rocky Outcropping。

flavor: The shadowy monster eyes you hungrily and begins to scrabble up the cliff face toward you. Now is your chance to see what weaknesses the greater shadows hold.
name: Abyssal Predator
text: [action]如果你位於Deep Lurker的地點，花費1個線索：攻擊。這次檢定不使用[combat]，改為使用[intellect]。如果你成功，對Deep Lurker造成1點傷害(如果你的地點上有4個或更多的牡蠣，改為2點傷害)。 目標 - 如果Deep Lurker被擊敗，推進場景。
back_flavor: You beat back the savage monster, throwing everything you have at it. After many grueling minutes, the shadowy creature grows unstable, and dissipates with a hollow cry. Bill the lizard's courage finally fails him, and he lets out a panicked yelp. He flees immediately at the awful sound of the shadow's death rattle, leaving you to face its fading form alone.

flavor: The inside of the rabbit's house is bizarrely reminiscent of something.
name: White Rabbit's House
text: [action]：撤退。"這可不像是海灘上悠閒的一天"。"This was no day at the beach." White Rabbit's House上的牡蠣不能超過6個。 強制 - 當調查階段開始時：在White Rabbit's House上放置線索(從供應堆拿取)，直到其上有1[per_investigator]個線索。 強制 - 如果White Rabbit's House上沒有線索，在冒險日誌裡的"Fragments of Alice"下方紀錄Intuition。
back_flavor: The place seems a bit displaced.

name: Sandy Strand
text:
Sandy Strand上的牡蠣不能超過6個。
[action]：檢定[agility](3)。如果你成功，從供應堆放置1個資源到Sandy Strand上，作為牡蠣。如果你成功且超過難度至少2點，在Sandy Strand上放置1個額外的牡蠣。
back_flavor: If only this were cleared away, it would be grand.

name: Tidal Pools
text:
Tidal Pools上的牡蠣不能超過6個。
[reaction]在你成功調查Tidal Pools且超過難度至少1點後：從供應堆放置1個資源到Tidal Pools上，作為牡蠣。
back_flavor: A series of separated pools stand barely in reach of the tide. Miniature ecosystems build and thrive within them.

name: Rocky Outcropping
text:
Rocky Outcropping上的牡蠣不能超過6個。
[action]選擇並丟棄最多2張手牌：從供應堆放置X個資源到Rocky Outcropping上，作為牡蠣。其中X為你丟棄的卡牌數量(每回合限制一次)。
back_flavor: A ledge juts out above the sea of tears, though the tide still washes shellfish halfway up the rocks.

name: Sheltered Shallows
text:
Sheltered Shallows上的牡蠣不能超過6個。
[reaction]在你在Sheltered Shallows擊敗1個敵人後：從供應堆放置X個資源到Sheltered Shallows上，作為牡蠣。其中X等於該敵人的生命值-1(最少1)。
back_flavor: All manner of fish congregate here in small schools, but where are the teachers?

name: Twining Reef
text:
Twining Reef上的牡蠣不能超過6個。
[action][action]：從供應堆放置2個資源到Twining Reef上，作為牡蠣。
back_flavor: The coral in this part of the coast weaves together and around itself in complicated loops that don't seem possible.

flavor: "There goes Bill!"
name: Bill the Lizard
text: [free]消耗Bill the Lizard：將Bill the Lizard移動到任意連接地點。除此之外，你可以從Bill the Lizard的當前地點移動最多6個牡蠣到他的新地點，但不能超過每個地點的最大數量。位於Bill the Lizard所在地點的任何調查員都可以啟動此能力。

name: The Eldest Oyster
text: [reaction]消耗The Eldest Oyster：這次檢定你+X技能值，其中X等於你的地點上的牡蠣數量。在The Eldest Oyster所在地點的任何調查員都可以啟動此能力。

name: Deep Lurker
text: 獵手。龐大。 強制 - 在攻擊Deep Lurker成功後：直到本輪結束，Deep Lurker+1攻擊。

name: Deep Lurker
text: 獵手。龐大。 強制 - 在攻擊Deep Lurker成功後：直到本輪結束，Deep Lurker+1攻擊。

name: Digging for Apples
text: 顯現 - 將Digging for Apples放置入場，放在你的威脅區域。 強制 - 在你啟動地點上的[action]或[reaction]能力時：花費2資源或受到1點傷害。 [action]如果你的地點上有6個牡蠣：丟棄Digging for Apples。

flavor: And this was odd, because it was the middle of the night.
name: Midnight Sun
text: 禍害。 顯現 - 你必須選擇(以下一項)： - 在當前密謀上放置1個毀滅標記。本效果可能導致當前密謀推進。 - 把你的2個線索放在你的地點上。 - 受到2點直接恐懼。

name: Pelagic Nightmare
text: 生成 - 任意[[Coastal]]地點。 獵手。 Bill the Lizard不能移動到Pelagic Nightmare所在地點。 強制 - 在Pelagic Nightmare進入一個地點後，如果Bill the Lizard位於該地點：將Bill the Lizard移動到隱藏值最低的連接地點。

flavor: "...and welcomes little fishes in with gently smiling jaws."
name: Saltwater Crocodile
text: 獵手。 生成 - 任意[[Coastal]]地點。 如果Saltwater Crocodile的地點上有至少3個牡蠣，其+1攻擊且+1傷害。

flavor: And this was odd, because it was the middle of the night.
name: Tidal Surge
text: 顯現 - 將盡量多的牡蠣從你的地點移動到所有連接的[[Coastal]]地點，盡量均勻分配。 如果此效果移動的牡蠣少於或等於1個，Tidal Surge獲得湧動。如果此效果移動了至少3個牡蠣，受到1點傷害。

name: The Walrus
text: 冷漠。 The Walrus不會受到傷害。 強制 - 在攻擊The Walrus成功後：從The Walrus移動最多1[per_investigator]個牡蠣到其所在地點(每輪限制一次)。
traits: Wonderland. 生物. 狂人. 精英

name: The Carpenter
text: 冷漠。 The Carpenter不會受到傷害。 強制 - 在攻擊The Carpenter成功後：從The Carpenter移動最多1[per_investigator]個牡蠣到其所在地點(每輪限制一次)。
traits: Wonderland. 類人. 狂人. 精英

flavor: The time has come, the Walrus said, To talk of many things:
name: Of Cabbages and Kings
text: 顯現 - 如果所有場上的牡蠣都在the Walrus和/或the Carpenter的地點上，Of Cabbages and Kings獲得湧動。否則，檢定[willpower](3)。如果你失敗，將X個不在The Walrus或The Carpenter的地點上的牡蠣往The Walrus或The Carpenter(取最近的)移動一次，其中X為你失敗且低於難度的點數。

flavor: "I weep for you,' the Walrus said: 'I deeply sympathize."
name: Whetted Appetite
text: 顯現 - 將Whetted Appetite放置入場，放在密謀牌堆旁。 強制 - 當一輪結束時，The Walrus和The Carpenter按玩家順序攻擊位於其所在地點的每個調查員。丟棄Whetted Appetite。

name: Tempest in a Teapot
text:
簡單 / 普通
[skull]:-X，其中X為當前'c'密謀的編號+1。
[cultist][tablet]：-2。如果你"have terrible table manners"，改為-4。
[elder_thing]：-3。在這次檢定結束後，如果你位於[[Chair]]地點，抽取Seat Deck頂部的1張卡牌，該卡替換為你的地點。將你原本的地點混洗回Seat Deck。
back_text:
困難 / 專家
[skull]：-X，其中X為當前'c'密謀的編號+2。
[cultist][tablet]：-3。如果你"have terrible table manners"，改為-5。
[elder_thing]：-4。在這次檢定結束後，如果你位於[[Chair]]地點，抽取Seat Deck頂部的1張卡牌，該卡替換為你的地點。將你原本的地點混洗回Seat Deck。

flavor: The swirling shadows have isolated you on the tea party table and the many chairs orbiting it, none of which seem particularly stable. You will have to work quickly if you are to find your way back to solid ground.
name: Steeped in Shadows
text: [[Chair]]地點上只能有一位調查員或一個敵人。 更多詳細資訊請參考劇本手冊中的Chair Locations部分。 所有敵人失去其生成指示，並獲得"生成 - 任意無人的[[Chair]]地點。"
back_flavor: As the chairs cycle in and out, to say nothing of the crazed partygoers that keep appearing at the table, you do your best to avoid being dragged down into the shadows below you. The table grows steadily more raucous as the occupants guzzle down the questionable-looking tea.
back_text: 治癒The Hare和The Hatter各2[per_investigator]點傷害。

flavor: Each time the chairs float away from the table, they seem to sink further and further from you. If this keeps up, you may soon run out of footing.
name: Drifting in Darkness
text: [[Chair]]地點上只能有一位調查員或一個敵人。 更多詳細資訊請參考劇本手冊中的Chair Locations部分。 所有敵人失去其生成指示，並獲得"生成 - 任意無人的[[Chair]]地點。"
back_flavor: The tea party guests guzzle down their drinks and stuff their faces with any bits of food they can reach as they keep up their nonsensical conversation. This madness is going to get you all killed, if they don't snap out of it.
back_text: 治癒The Hare和The Hatter各2[per_investigator]點傷害。

flavor: The sparse light illuminating the tea party table is fading fast. If you don't find a way out before the darkness envelops you, there's no telling if you'll ever see daylight again.
name: Minutes to Midnight
text: [[Chair]]地點上只能有一位調查員或一個敵人。 更多詳細資訊請參考劇本手冊中的Chair Locations部分。 所有敵人失去其生成指示，並獲得"生成 - 任意無人的[[Chair]]地點。"
back_flavor: Whatever force was holding the tea party table afloat cannot oppose the grasping shadows any longer. The table and chairs fall away from you, and you can't prevent yourself from falling into darkness.
back_text: 由於被the shadows帶走，每位未被擊敗的調查員受到1點精神或肉體創傷(自行選擇)。 (→結局1)

flavor: The Hare and Hatter seem quite content to continue their festivities amid the chaos, though they react wildly to any perceived violations of etiquette. They are not only unaware of the shadows, but seemingly unaffected by them as well. What role they have in keeping the tea party afloat is unclear, but you had best proceed with caution in any case.
name: The Mad Tea Party
text: 毀滅標記不能放在此密謀上。 [action]花費1[per_investigator]個線索：撤退。你相信自己的直覺，跨入shadows之中。 強制 - 如果The Hare或The Hatter被擊敗，推進場景。
back_text:
如果The Hatter被擊敗：
The Hatter gives a distressed gurgle and slumps down in his chair as your final blow strikes him. Instantly, the Hare draws upward in a fury and points an accusing finger at you. "If you're going to roughhouse then do it away from the table! I won't have you distressing the other guests!"
將The Hare翻面。請記住擊敗The Hatter的調查員"has terrible table manners"。推進到密謀2C - The Mad March Hare。 如果The Hare被擊敗：
The Hare collapses limply onto the table as your final attack makes its mark. The Hatter hurls a half-filled teacup at you, utterly livid. "Now you've done it! A perfectly stimulating conversation ruined by your hooliganism! If you can't be civil, then you shouldn't speak at all!"
將The Hatter翻面。請記住擊敗The Hare的調查員"has terrible table manners"。推進到密謀2C - The Mad Hatter.

flavor: The Hare's anger at the death of his friend drives him into a feral state. Nothing you can say or do placates him in the slightest. You will have to continue your attempts at grounding the tea party with this new wrinkle.
name: The Mad March Hare
text: 毀滅標記不能放在此密謀上。 [action]花費1[per_investigator]個線索：撤退。你相信自己的直覺，跨入shadows之中。 強制 - 如果The Hare被擊敗，推進場景。
back_flavor: The Hare tumbles out of his seat, grasping upward feebly as he vanishes into the darkness below. The whole table shudders, rattling the dishes as the shadows close inward on you.
back_text:
請記住擊敗The Hare的調查員"has terrible table manners"。
推進到密謀3C - An Uncontrolled Party。

flavor: The Hatter is so infuriated by the death of his companion that he can hardly speak, and he stares at you with malice clear in his eyes. You will have to continue your investigations despite his state of fury.
name: The Mad Hatter
text: 毀滅標記不能放在此密謀上。 [action]花費1[per_investigator]個線索：撤退。你相信自己的直覺，跨入shadows之中。 強制 - 如果The Hatter被擊敗，推進場景。
back_flavor: The Hatter falls to his knees with a small wail before plummeting down into the roiling shadows. With his disappearance, the darkness seems to close in on you, and the table shakes with a creak of timbers.
back_text:
請記住擊敗The Hatter的調查員"has terrible table manners"。
推進到密謀3C - An Uncontrolled Party。

flavor: With the Hare and Hatter deceased, the floating tea party grows increasingly unstable. Shadowy tendrils reach in from all sides, attempting to drag the chairs and table apart. You had best make these next minutes count.
name: An Uncontrolled Party
text: 毀滅標記不能放在此密謀上。 [action]花費1[per_investigator]個線索：撤退。你相信自己的直覺，跨入shadows之中。 強制 - 當神話階段開始時，如果場上沒有敵人：在'a'密謀上放置1個毀滅標記。
back_text:
你看這一面做什麼？
你還有更重要的事情要做。
翻回密謀3c。

flavor: As you struggle to find your footing, your task is already clear. The shadows swept in the moment the Dormouse fell asleep. The problem now, however, is that the table's contents were jumbled when this whole event started. You've got to find the Dormouse at all costs.
name: Mouse Hunt
text: 額外的移動方式請參考劇本手冊中的Chair Locations部分。
back_flavor: With the table's contents shifting constantly, you devise a way to mark each of the teapots as they cycle past each chair around the table. At long last, you narrow the options down to a single teapot in the middle of the table. Its appearance is different than the one you remember the Dormouse slipping down into, but you know better than to trust your eyes at this point.
back_text: 將放在一邊的The Dormouse放置入場，放在Center of the Table。

flavor: You lift the lid and try to shake the Dormouse awake, but he remains in a deep sleep. Perhaps something at the table here could rouse him. You'll have to pick carefully, however. There's no telling what could be in each teapot or cup.
name: Wake Up Call
text: 額外的移動方式請參考劇本手冊中的Chair Locations部分。 只要The Dormouse在場上且不在調查員控制下，他獲得："[action][action]以團隊為單位，花費1[per_investigator]個線索：談判。控制The Dormouse。" 目標 - 如果有調查員控制The Dormouse，推進場景。
back_flavor: You find the one cup of tea with a much more pleasing aroma than the others and hold it up to the Dormouse's nose. He stirs lightly at first, then awakens at once with a loud gasp. Panic overtakes him until he sees you looking down at him with concern. "You're... you're here to help...?" he asks you with a quaver in his voice. You nod, and he nods quickly in return. "Help at last... good, good. The things prey on dreams, even within a dream. If you fall asleep, you're as good as a fish in a pot. We've got to drive these shadows away, but we have to anchor the table and chairs back to Wonderland."

flavor: "You've got to tether the chairs at once," the Dormouse commands, "find a way to anchor each one, and the table will return with it." You look back around the table and wrack your brain for a way to accomplish exactly that.
name: Return Trip
text: 額外的移動方式請參考劇本手冊中的Chair Locations部分。 [action]如果你位於[[Chair]]地點：檢定[willpower](X)，其中X為你的地點和所有連接的[[Chair]]地點的隱藏值總和。你可以以團隊為單位花費任意數量的線索，每花費一個線索，+2[willpower]。如果你成功，在你所在地點和所有連接的[[Chair]]地點上放置1個恐懼標記，作為tethers。有tethers的地點不能離場，也不能被卡牌效果移動。 目標 - 如果所有[[Chair]]地點上都有tether，推進場景。
back_flavor: In each chair, you try to direct your memories towards your adventures in Wonderland thus far. Each image you conjure and event you replay seems to banish a small patch of darkness under each seat. You continue around the table until at last, a ring of grass surrounds the tea party. As if severed, the shadows retreat, and slowly the Hare's garden fades back into vision.
back_text: 如果當前的'c'密謀是The Mad Tea Party，(→結局2)。 如果當前的'c'密謀是The Mad March Hare，(→結局3)。 如果當前的'c'密謀是The Mad Hatter，(→結局4). 如果當前的'c'密謀是An Uncontrolled Party，(→結局5)。

name: Center of the Table
text: 敵人不能移動到Center of the Table。 強制 - 當調查階段結束時，每位在Center of the Table的調查員必須失去1資源或從供應堆放置1個線索到Center of the Table上。 強制 - 在你移動到Center of the Table後：記住你"have terrible table manners"。 [action]如果沒有無人的[[Chair]]地點：選擇1個[[Chair]]地點的非[[精英]]敵人。該敵人立刻攻擊你。然後，移動到該敵人所在地點，並丟棄該敵人。
back_text: 敵人不能移動到Center of the Table。 強制 - 在你移動到Center of the Table後：記住你"have terrible table manners"。

name: Head of the Table
text: Head of the Table不能離場。 Head of the Table連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Head of the Table後，從供應堆放置線索到Head of the Table上，直到其起始數量。 [action]：Place 1 resource on Head of the Table from the token bank, as a tick. If there are 1 [per_investigator] ticks on Head of the Table，在冒險日誌裡的"Fragments of Alice"下方紀錄Patience。
back_flavor: An absurdly tall red chair sits at the head of the tea-table, occupied by the hosting Hare.
back_text: Head of the Table不能離場。

name: Adirondack Chair
text: Adirondack Chair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Adirondack Chair後，從供應堆放置線索到Adirondack Chair上，直到其起始數量。然後，在每個連接的[[Chair]]地點上放置1個線索。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Armchair
text: Armchair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Armchair後，從供應堆放置線索到Armchair上，直到其起始數量。然後，如果你沒有控制至少占用1個手部槽位的支援：：失去一次行動。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Barstool
text: Barstool連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Barstool後，從供應堆放置線索到Barstool上，直到其起始數量。然後，失去2個資源或1次行動(自行選擇)。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Club Chair
text: Club Chair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Club Chair後：從供應堆放置線索到Club Chair上，直到其起始數量。然後，你可以立刻將場上任意1個非[[精英]]敵人移動到連接該地點的[[Chair]]地點。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Deck Chair
text: Deck Chair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Deck Chair後，從供應堆放置線索到Deck Chair上，直到其起始數量。然後，將1個你的線索放到Deck Chair上。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Dining Chair
text: Dining Chair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Dining Chair後，從供應堆放置線索到Dining Chair上，直到其起始數量。然後，翻開你牌堆頂的1張卡牌。如果是支援卡，你可以抽取該卡。否則，如果不是弱點卡，將其丟棄。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Folding Chair
text: Folding Chair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Folding Chair後，從供應堆放置線索到Folding Chair上，直到其起始數量。然後，你可以立刻移動到一個連接地點。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Ornate Chair
text: Ornate Chair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Ornate Chair後，從供應堆放置線索到Ornate Chair上，直到其起始數量。然後，你可以獲得1資源。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Patio Chair
text: Patio Chair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Patio Chair後，從供應堆放置線索到Patio Chair上，直到其起始數量。然後，隨機丟棄1張手牌。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Rocking Chair
text: Rocking Chair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Rocking Chair後，從供應堆放置線索到Rocking Chair上，直到其起始數量。然後，丟棄你牌堆頂的1張卡牌。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Salon Chair
text: Salon Chair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Salon Chair後，從供應堆放置線索到Salon Chair上，直到其起始數量。然後，翻開你牌堆頂的1張卡牌。如果是技能卡，你可以抽取該卡。否則，如果不是弱點卡，將其丟棄。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Scissor Chair
text: Scissor Chair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Scissor Chair後，從供應堆放置線索到Scissor Chair上，直到其起始數量。然後，翻開你牌堆頂的1張卡牌。如果是事件卡，你可以抽取該卡。否則，如果不是弱點卡，將其丟棄。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Swivel Chair
text: Swivel Chair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Swivel Chair後，從供應堆放置線索到Swivel Chair上，直到其起始數量。然後，選擇你手牌中1張非弱點卡牌，將其放到你的牌堆底部。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Throne
text: Throne連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Throne後，從供應堆放置線索到Throne上，直到其起始數量。然後，翻開你牌堆頂的1張卡牌。如果該卡費用的數值比Throne的隱藏值高，獲得1資源。否則，失去1資源。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Wicker Chair
text: Wicker Chair連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Wicker Chair後，從供應堆放置線索到Wicker Chair上，直到其起始數量。然後，如果你沒有控制至少占用1個法術槽位的支援：失去一次行動。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

name: Wooden Stool
text: Wooden Stool連接到順時鐘和逆時鐘方向的[[Chair]]地點。 強制 - 在你進入Wooden Stool後，從供應堆放置線索到Wooden Stool上，直到其起始數量。X等於你控制的支援上子彈、補給、充能或秘密的數量之中最高的數值。
back_flavor:
Unoccupied for the moment.
The stains might be tea or jam, or they might not be.

flavor: Dreams within dreams, and none of them quite making sense.
name: The Dormouse
text:
你的手牌上限增加1。
[reaction]在你從你的牌堆抽取1張非弱點卡牌後，消耗The Dormouse：將該卡洗回你的牌堆，再抽1張卡牌。
traits: 盟友. Wonderland. 生物. 學者.

name: The Hare
text: The Hare不能攻擊位於Center of the Table的調查員。 強制 - 在調查員對其他敵人造成傷害後，如果The Hare處於準備狀態：他向該調查員移動一次。如果The Hare已在該調查員的連接地點，改為攻擊該調查員。 [action]：談判。 檢定[combat](3)來用力量測試使the Hare分心。如果你成功，自動躲避The Hare。
traits: Wonderland. 生物. 狂人. 精英

name: The Hare
text: 強制 - 在調查員對其他敵人造成傷害後，如果The Hare處於準備狀態：他向該調查員移動一次。如果The Hare已在該調查員的連接地點，改為與該調查員交戰並攻擊。
traits: Wonderland. 生物. 狂人. 精英

name: The Hatter
text: The Hatter不能攻擊位於Center of the Table的調查員。 強制 - 在調查員發現任意數量的線索後，如果The Hatter處於準備狀態：他向該調查員移動一次。如果The Hatter已在該調查員的連接地點，改為攻擊該調查員。 [action]：談判。檢定[intellect](3)來用一個謎語使the Hatter分心。如果你成功，自動躲避The Hatter。
traits: Wonderland. 類人. 狂人. 精英

name: The Hatter
text: 強制 - 在調查員發現任意數量的線索後，如果The Hatter處於準備狀態：他向該調查員移動一次。如果The Hatter已在該調查員的連接地點，改為與該調查員交戰並攻擊。
traits: Wonderland. 類人. 狂人. 精英

name: Bizarre Brew
text: 禍害。 顯現 - 你必須選擇(以下一項)： - 你大口喝下神秘的飲料。 檢定[combat](3)。如果你失敗，受到1點傷害且失去2資源。 - 你拒絕喝下你面前的杯子裡的液體。 記住你"have terrible table manners"。如果你已經"have terrible table manners"，改為受到2點恐懼。

name: Change Places!
text: 湧動。 顯現 - 如果你位於一個untethered的[[Chair]]地點，將你的地點與最遠的untethered的[[Chair]]地點交換。地點上的調查員和敵人與地點一同移動。

name: Clean Cup!
text: 禍害。 顯現 - 你必須選擇(以下一項)： - 每位在[[Chair]]地點的調查員和敵人順時針或逆時針方向移動一次。所有移動視為同時發生，不會觸發趁亂攻擊。 - 你拒絕離開你的座位。記住你"have terrible table manners"。如果你已經"have terrible table manners"，改為受到2點恐懼。

flavor: A cackling voice sounds from one of the chairs as another partygoer suddenly appears, sipping daintily from a tarry black cup.
name: Demented Guest
text: 強制 - 在After Demented Guest進入一個地點後：在Demented Guest上放置1個毀滅標記。

name: Mind Your Manners
text: 顯現 - 將Mind Your Manners放置入場，放在你的威脅區域。 你不能執行談判行動。 [free]丟棄Mind Your Manners。記住你"have terrible table manners"。如果你已經"have terrible table manners"，改為受到2點恐懼。 強制 - 當一輪結束時，丟棄Mind Your Manners。

flavor: The wolfish guest eyes the places at the table next to him with genteel manners, but a feral look in his eye.
name: Obsessive Visitor
text:
獵手。
X等於Obsessive Visitor的地點與每個連接的[[Chair]]地點上的線索總數(最多5)。

flavor: The old man's headgear resembles a samovar, and he pours himself a cup of tea by bowing his head forward.
name: Teetotaler
text: 如果你"have terrible table manners"，Teetotaler獲得反擊和警戒。

flavor: "I told you butter wouldn't suit the works!"
name: Two Days Wrong
text: 顯現 - 檢定[willpower](2)。如果你"have terrible table manners"，這次檢定獲得禍害關鍵詞且難度+2。如果你失敗，受到1點恐懼並失去一次行動。

name: Bleeding Hearts
text:
簡單 / 普通
[skull]：-X，其中X等於你的Royal Suspicion上的blame數量的一半(向上取整)。
[cultist]：-2。如果The Queen of Hearts位於你的地點，改為-4。
[tablet]：-3。如果你失敗，在你的Royal Suspicion上放置1個blame。
[elder_thing]：-2。如果The Executioner在場上，改為-4。
back_text:
困難 / 專家
[skull]：-X，X等於你的Royal Suspicion上的blame數量。
[cultist]：-2。如果The Queen of Hearts位於你的地點或連接地點，改為-4。
[tablet]：-4。如果你失敗，在你的Royal Suspicion上放置1個blame。
[elder_thing]：-3。如果The Executioner在場上，改為-5。

flavor: A case of stolen tarts. You'd laugh if it weren't being pinned on you with the death penalty waiting. The majority of the guards are still allowing you to move about the castle despite the accusations, so you'll have to do your best to not arouse the court's wrath any further.
name: Head Games
text: 強制 - 當神話階段結束時：按玩家順序，每位Royal Suspicion上有至少7個blame的調查員抽取1張額外的遭遇卡。
back_flavor: "Haven't you found the culprit yet?! Off with his head!" The Queen's mood is worsening, and the executioner hurriedly sharpens his axe to comply with her wishes.
back_text: 如果The Executioner在場上，在他身上放置1個毀滅標記。否則，查找遭遇牌堆和棄牌堆，找出並生成The Executioner。

flavor: The Queen stalks the castle grounds on the hunt for a victim. You're beginning to wonder just how much the Queen cares about the tarts, or if she just wants an excuse to execute someone.
name: Scapegoats
text: The Queen of Hearts gains 警戒。 強制 - 當神話階段結束時：按玩家順序，每位Royal Suspicion上有至少7個blame的調查員抽取1張額外的遭遇卡。
back_flavor: Another bellow from the Queen sends the executioner scrambling after you. You've given him the slip a few times already, but he's not about to lose his job over you, or his head for that matter.
back_text: 如果The Executioner在場上，在他身上放置1個毀滅標記。否則，查找遭遇牌堆和棄牌堆，找出並生成The Executioner。

flavor: If this keeps up, the whole castle will soon be after your head. If you don't make these next few minutes count, then there won't be a chance to redeem yourself.
name: Eliminating Suspects
text: The Executioner和The Queen of Hearts獲得警戒。 強制 - 當神話階段結束時：按玩家順序，每位Royal Suspicion上有至少7個blame的調查員抽取1張額外的遭遇卡。
back_flavor: The sheer number of card guards cut off every possible avenue of escape. Cornered against stone walls with your resources depleted, you stare grimly as the Queen and her executioner approach. "There can be no doubt! Off with their heads this instant!"
back_text: 每位未撤退的調查員被擊敗。

flavor: The Queen of Hearts seems likely to decapitate everyone in sight if this theft isn't cleared up. First thing's first however, namely getting access to the crime scenes to clear your name. How easy that would be if you weren't the current primary suspect in all this.
name: Lip Service
text: 目標 - 如果至少有1[per_investigator]個翻開的[[Restricted]]地點，你必須推進場景。
back_flavor: You manage to ingratiate yourself with the queen's court enough for the guards to ease up on their restrictions. Now that you have access to the more closely-guarded parts of the castle, you can finally make some progress on tracking down the culprit. However, a greater problem has risen to light during your initial scouting of the castle. Shadowy creatures lurk in the darker recesses of the castle, and often found wherever crumbs of the tarts lie scattered. If Gurathnaka's minions are going to attack the castle, they certainly are biding their time.

flavor: While the queen's cronies have been quick about locking down the castle, they certainly haven't been thorough at their investigations. Between the missing tarts and the lurking threat of the shadows, finding the thief seems to be the key to both mysteries.
name: Trail of Tart-crumbs
text: 目標 - 只有位於Hedge Maze的調查員可以花費所需數量的線索來推進場景。
back_flavor: In a lonely branch of the hedge maze, you are finally able to locate the thief - the Knave of Hearts, as you might have expected. He sits on the grass with half a plate of tarts beside him and some red smudges at the corners of his mouth. Your approach startles the Knave, and he quickly stands to appraise you. "You are neither guard nor card. Good, you can assist in my plan. The tarts were a start, but the Queen must be driven into a greater fury." He leans in toward you to whisper, but keeps a bit of distance still. "I've seen shadowy creatures lurking in the darkest corners of the palace. You've seen them too, haven't you? I know what they can do to people, and I've no desire to follow suit. The trouble is, I can't get at them. Only intense emotions seem to draw them out out of hiding. The Queen's rage should be bait enough, but she must be in a state of rage like never before. I can vandalize the castle to provoke her, but I shall need your assistance."
back_text: 將放在一邊的The Knave of Hearts放置入場，位於Hedge Maze。

flavor: The Knave may not be the most trustworthy person you've met, but the threat of Gurathnaka's shadows consuming the palace has forced your hand.
name: Anger Management
text: [action]如果你位於The Knave of Hearts的地點，花費1個線索：在你的地點上放置1個傷害標記，並將The Knave of Hearts移動到一個連接地點。 [reaction]在你擊敗敵人後：在你的地點上放置1個傷害標記。 [reaction]在The Queen of Hearts進入一個地點後，如果該地點上有傷害標記：從該地點移除所有傷害標記，並在The Queen of Hearts上放置等量的恐懼。 目標 - 如果The Queen of Hearts上至少有3[per_investigator]個恐懼，推進場景。
back_flavor: Your attempts at provoking the Queen's short temper reach immediate success. Between your direct interference and the Knave's expert sabotage of the castle, the Queen of Hearts has been pushed past her limit. "OFF WITH ALL OF YOUR HEADS!" she blasts, her face red as her own roses as she begins a tantrum. Shadows shift around the castle, reaching toward the queen in the midst of her meltdown.

flavor: Buckets and brushes lie abandoned by the white rose bushes. If the queen is as passionate about her roses as she was about her tarts, then you might be able to get in her good graces by doing a bit of impromptu gardening.
name: Rose Garden
text: [action][action] You replant one of the white rose bushes with a red one：從你的Royal Suspicion移除1個blame。 [action]如果你的Royal Suspicion沒有blame：撤退。在有人能責備你之前，你就溜了。You flee before anyone else tries to condemn you.
back_flavor: The royal gardens bristle with bright red flowers of every variety, though you notice a small section of rose bushes that glisten and drip with a coating of red paint.

flavor: A small group of the queen's courtiers play croquet on the open terrace, albeit with flamingos and rolled-up hedgehogs instead of mallets and balls.
name: Croquet Grounds
text: [action]：You try to impress the courtiers to get them on your side。檢定[combat]或[agility](3)。如果你成功，從你的Royal Suspicion移除1個blame。如果你失敗且低於難度至少2點，改為在你的Royal Suspicion上放置1個blame。
back_flavor: The sounds of laughter coming from the grounds mix with the squawks and squeaks of distressed animals. Just what sort of games are being played here?

flavor: Several members of the royal court amble about the maze, utterly lost but too proud to admit it. Perhaps you could gain their favor by helping them out of the labyrinth.
name: Hedge Maze
text: [action]：You try to give directions to one of the lost courtiers。檢定[willpower]或[intellect](3)。如果你成功，從你的Royal Suspicion移除1個blame。如果你失敗且低於難度至少2點，改為在你的Royal Suspicion上放置1個blame。
back_flavor: With how difficult Wonderland has been to navigate, you can only guess how much more frustrating a deliberate maze would be.

flavor: The eye of scrutiny is definitely strongest here. The members of the queen's court are all too eager to gain her favor by getting her angry at someone else.
name: Throne Room
text: 強制 - 在你從Throne Room發現任意數量的線索後：在你的Royal Suspicion上放置1個blame，或從遭遇牌堆抽取1張卡牌(自行選擇)。
back_flavor: Heart motifs decorate every column, arch, and banner of the castle. Even the double doors leading to the royal audience chamber are heart-shaped.

flavor: The Queen's gardeners are awaiting execution forlornly, but patiently. If only there was something you could do for the poor doomed cards.
name: Dungeons
text: [reaction]在你在本地點躲避或擊敗The Executioner後：在Dungeons上放置1資源(從供應堆拿取)，作為鑰匙。 強制 - 如果Dungeons上有至少1[per_investigator]個鑰匙：在冒險日誌裡的"Fragments of Alice"下方紀錄Compassion。
back_flavor: The castle dungeons are under strict lock and key, as you might expect. The sighs and groans of languishing prisoners fill the air.
back_text: 如果你的Royal Suspicion上有至少2個blame，你不能進入Dungeons。

flavor: The jurors sit in their box with chalkboards in hand. Perhaps you can influence them before any trials get underway.
name: Courtroom
text: [action]如果Courtroom上沒有線索：從你的Royal Suspicion移除最多4個blame，並在Courtroom上放置等量的線索(從供應堆拿取)。
back_flavor: With blame being constantly thrown your way, you don't relish the idea of being in a place that can make it official.
back_text: 如果你的Royal Suspicion上有至少2個blame，你不能進入Courtroom。

flavor: The kitchens are a mess as the queen's servants ready the tarts. As they haven't cleaned up, there may be some evidence left from whoever stole the first set.
name: Kitchens
text: [reaction]在Kitchens的最後一個線索被發現後：從每位調查員的Royal Suspicion上移除2個blame(團隊每場遊戲限制一次)。
back_flavor: The smell of freshly-baked tarts slips through the door to the royal kitchens. This new batch is being closely guarded, and anyone suspected of filching the first bunch is not allowed inside.
back_text: 如果你的Royal Suspicion上有至少2個blame，你不能進入Kitchens。

flavor: Most of the card guards are out scouring the castle grounds for the culprit. The few that remain take offense at your intrusion here.
name: Guard Barracks
text: 你調查Guard Barracks時，如果你的手牌等於2張或更少，Guard Barracks獲得+2隱藏值。 強制 - 在調查階段結束時：位於Guard Barracks的每位調查員必須隨機丟棄1張手牌。
back_flavor: The queen's card guards cross their spears as you approach, highly suspicious of anyone that she has accused of thievery.
back_text: 如果你的Royal Suspicion上有至少2個blame，你不能進入Guard Barracks。

name: Royal Suspicion
text: 使用(3 blame)。 強制 - 在有任何效果將要在Royal Suspicion上放置blame時：從供應堆放置資源到Royal Suspicion上，作為blame。Blame本身沒有效果，但其他卡牌可能會參考你的Royal Suspicion上的blame數量。

flavor:
If you need to get out of danger quickly,
the Knave might be around or he might not be.
name: The Knave of Hearts
text:
你+1[agility]。
[reaction]在你在攻擊或躲避中抽出一個混亂標記時，消耗The Knave of Hearts：取消這次攻擊或躲避。

flavor: 他把"批判"和"精神"變成了"愛批評"。He puts both the "judge" and "mental" into "judgmental."
name: The King of Hearts
text: [action]：談判。從你的Royal Suspicion移動最多3個blame到另一位調查員的Royal Suspicion上。位於The King of Hearts所在地點的任何調查員都可以啟動此能力。 [action]花費任意數量的資源：談判。每花費3資源，從你的Royal Suspicion移除1個blame。位於The King of Hearts所在地點的任何調查員都可以啟動此能力。

name: The Queen of Hearts
text: 冷漠。獵手。獵物 - Royal Suspicion上最多blame的調查員。 The Queen of Hearts不會受到傷害。如果有調查員位於The Queen of Hearts的地點，且其Royal Suspicion上有至少4個blame，The Queen of Hearts失去冷漠。 強制 - 當敵軍階段結束時，如果The Queen of Hearts處於準備狀態：位於The Queen of Hearts的地點的每位調查員在其Royal Suspicion上放置1個blame。 強制 - 在你攻擊The Queen of Hearts成功後：本階段剩餘期間，她-3躲避。在你的Royal Suspicion上放置1個blame。
traits: Wonderland. 類人. Card. Royalty. 精英

name: The Executioner
text: 冷漠。獵手。生成 - Guard Barracks或Dungeons。獵物 - Royal Suspicion上最多blame的調查員。 如果有調查員位於The Executioner的地點，且其Royal Suspicion上有至少4個blame，The Executioner失去冷漠。 強制 - 在來自The Executioner的攻擊傷害擊敗調查員或盟友後：在他身上放置1個毀滅標記。
traits: Wonderland. 類人. Card. Soldier. 精英

name: Corrupt Noble
text: 強制 - 在Corrupt Noble攻擊你後：失去2資源。如果你不能失去2資源，改為受到1點恐懼。 [action]如果你與Corrupt Noble交戰：談判。 檢定[willpower](3)。如果你成功，自動躲避The Queen of Hearts或The Executioner(自行選擇)，並將Corrupt Noble洗回遭遇牌堆。如果你失敗，在Corrupt Noble上放置1個毀滅標記。

name: Court Sycophant
text: 生成 - 任意連接地點。 強制 - 在Court Sycophant生成時：在Court Sycophant上放置1個毀滅標記，或在你的Royal Suspicion上放置2個blame並丟棄Court Sycophant(自行選擇)。

name: Damning Evidence
text: 禍害。 顯現 - 你必須選擇(以下一項)： - 在當前密謀上放置1個毀滅標記。本效果可能導致當前密謀推進。 - 在你的Royal Suspicion上放置2個blame。 - 在另一位調查員的Royal Suspicion上放置4個blame。

name: "Off With Their Heads!"
text: 顯現 - 如果The Executioner在場上，在他身上放置1個毀滅標記。否則，查找遭遇牌堆和棄牌堆，找出並生成The Executioner。如果你的Royal Suspicion上有至少4個blame，在The Executioner放置1個額外的毀滅標記。

name: Pointing Fingers
text: 禍害。 顯現 - 在任意一位調查員的Royal Suspicion上放置1個blame。如果該調查員的Royal Suspicion上有至少4個blame，在距離該調查員最近的[[Card]]敵人上放置1個毀滅標記。該調查員檢定[willpower](X)，其中X為其Royal Suspicion上的blame的數量。如果檢定失敗，該調查員受到1點恐懼且失去一次行動。

name: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
text: 顯現 - 檢定[agility](3)。如果你失敗，在你的Royal Suspicion上放置2個blame。如果你失敗且低於難度至少2點，受到1點傷害。如果你的Royal Suspicion上有至少4個blame，受到1點恐懼。

flavor: Have a heart.
name: Executioner's Axe
text: [action] 攻擊。這次攻擊你+1[combat]。這次攻擊造成+1點傷害。如果這次攻擊期間抽出了[skull]或[elder_thing]標記，你可以將該標記的修正值視為0，或造成1點額外的傷害(自行選擇)。
traits: 道具. 武器. 近戰. Wonderland.

name: Wild Snark Chase
text:
簡單 / 普通
[skull]：-X，X等於當前密謀上毀滅標記的數量的一半(向上取整)。
[cultist]：-4。如果這是你的回合，你可以花費一次行動來使這個標記改為-2。
[tablet]：-3。如果你失敗且你的地點上沒有恐懼，受到1點恐懼。
[elder_thing]：-2。如果The Jabberwock在場上，改為-4。
back_text:
困難 / 專家
[skull]：-X，X等於當前密謀上毀滅標記的數量的一半(向上取整)+1。
[cultist]：-5。如果這是你的回合，你可以花費一次行動來使這個標記改為-3。
[tablet]：-4。如果你的地點上沒有恐懼，受到1點恐懼。
[elder_thing]：-3。如果The Jabberwock在場上，改為-5。

flavor: Despite the enthusiasm of the Bellman and his party, you have some reservations about searching through these woods in the dark. You get the unsettling feeling that as you search for the Snark, something far stranger and far stronger hunts for you.
name: Twas Brillig
text: [action]受到1點肉體創傷和1點精神創傷：撤退。You break away from the search and hope to find the trail out.
back_flavor: The Tulgey Wood reverberates with a horrible noise, an indescribable hissing, gurgling, roaring sound. You don't have to ask what sort of monster could make that noise as you see it hurtling through the woods toward you. It is an enormous loathsome thing with fiery eyes and razor-sharp claws that rend trees apart as it passes. Fear courses through your veins and you have scant seconds to decide whether to run or fight.
back_text: 查找所有遊戲區域和場外(包括勝利牌區)，找出The Jabberwock並將其移動到調查員隊長的地點。將放在一邊的Jabberwocky遭遇組的剩餘卡牌洗入遭遇牌堆。

flavor: "It's the Jabberwock!" the Bellman cries, and rings his bell in wild alarm. The warning doesn't help you in the slightest however, as you are already in the throes of battle with it. The monster swoops and vanishes in its wild attacks, making you wonder just where and when it will strike next. You try to keep up the search while accounting for this added menace, but the Jabberwock's attack has drawn the attention of much darker beings.
name: A Manxome Foe
text: [action]受到1點肉體創傷和1點精神創傷：撤退。You break away from the search and hope to find the trail out.
back_flavor: The fiendish creature attacks with increasing frequency and fervor as you attempt to scour the Tulgey Wood. No matter where you turn, the Jabberwock's burning eyes and vicious claws are there to meet you. Even your best attacks leave you wondering if the beast can actually be killed at all.
back_text: 查找所有遊戲區域和場外(包括勝利牌區)，找出The Jabberwock並將其移動到調查員隊長的地點。如果The Jabberwock從勝利牌區入場，在其上放置2[per_investigator]個傷害。

flavor: Even without accounting for the menace of the Jabberwock, the expedition's hopes are rapidly dwindling. The motley hunters cower in fear while the Bellman proudly declares that the Bodyguard will see them through yet. You have every intention of doing so, but the growing darkness and ravenous beasts of the wood may prove otherwise.
name: The Trail Grows Cold
text: [action]受到1點肉體創傷和1點精神創傷：撤退。You break away from the search and hope to find the trail out.
back_flavor: As the Snark hunters grow more separated in their pursuit, the Bellman attempts to keep the group's morale in check. The bell clamors and clangs, but by now, all it can do is attract the attention of the many shadows drawn by the Jabberwock's attack.
back_text: 每位未撤退的調查員被擊敗。

flavor: "Onward to the Snark!" the Bellman shouts as the hunters scatter into the Tulgey Wood. "Search high and low, for a Snark may lurk in any tree or hollow! Once we've gotten our bearings, it's as good as found!" You're not convinced it'll be that easy, or if the creature even resides in these woods at all, but some reconnaissance can't hurt.
name: Babes in the Woods
text: 在任意地點的調查員都可以啟動The Bellman的能力。 [action]如果你的地點上沒有恐懼，以團隊為單位花費1[per_investigator]個線索：在該地點放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。 目標 - 如果有6個翻開的[[Tulgey Wood]]地點，推進場景。
back_flavor: You and the other Snark hunters report your survey of the immediate area, but the Bellman is occupied with his own discovery. Near the tumtum tree, he stands above a small ditch where a discarded sword lies half-buried in mud. "Bodyguard!" he cries, looking for you, "it's sensible that the Bodyguard should manage all our weaponry for once we've found the Snark. Come collect this one! It should help us threaten the beast into submission!" You oblige the Bellman reluctantly, but are pleasantly surprised to find the weapon of surprisingly good quality and condition.
back_text: 選擇一位調查員控制放在一邊的The Vorpal Blade支援。在本場冒險剩下的時間裡，該支援不佔用任何槽位。

flavor: Despite the magnitude of the task and the inexperience of the other hunters, there seems to be some promise of success. All that remains now is to chase the trails wherever they may lead.
name: The Hunting of the Snark
text: 在任意地點的調查員都可以啟動The Bellman的能力。 [action]如果你的地點上沒有恐懼，以團隊為單位花費1[per_investigator]個線索：在該地點放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。 目標 - 在The Snark入場時，推進場景。
back_flavor: "Snark ahoy!" the Bellman hollers, "if it should prove no Boojum, then after it with haste!" You hurry toward the commotion and finally catch your first real glimpse of the Snark. Its appearance strikes you as being rather plain compared with the majority of Wonderland's other odd creatures. Could this really be the beast whose talents you need to escape these darkening woods alive?

flavor: "Now's our chance!" the Bellman bellows, "Seek it with thimbles, seek it with care! Pursue it with forks and hope! Threaten its life with a railway-share! Charm it with smiles and soap! Only vary your methods, or the Snark may grow suspicious!"
name: Catchall
text: 在任意地點的調查員都可以啟動The Bellman的能力。 [action]如果你位於The Snark的地點：談判。檢定任意技能(4)。如果你成功，根據使用的技能，從供應堆放置1個標記到The Snark上： - 如果你使用[willpower]：1個恐懼。 - 如果你使用[intellect]：1個線索。 - 如果你使用[combat]：1個傷害。 - 如果你使用[agility]：1個資源。 如果你失敗，將The Snark移動到一個連接地點。 目標 - 如果The Snark上總共有2[per_investigator]個標記，你必須立刻推進。
back_flavor: You try every tactic you can to lure the Snark into capture. After minutes of half-hearted interest, the strange creature finally calms enough for you to approach and lay hands on it. "Masterfully snatched, Bodyguard!" the Bellman cheers, clanging his bell to gather the scattered expedition around.

flavor: The signs of a monstrous attack are etched into the lone tree.
name: Tumtum Tree
text: [action]：查找所有遊戲區域和場外(包括勝利牌區)，找出The Jabberwock，將其準備並移動到Tumtum Tree。在冒險日誌裡的"Fragments of Alice"下方紀錄Courage。
back_flavor: The perfect spot for resting and standing in thought. The Bellman rallies the Snark hunters from the tree, encouraging them with the loud clanging of his bell.

flavor: A number of different nests clump together under the sundial.
name: The Wabe
text: [action]如果The Wabe上沒有恐懼也沒有線索：在The Wabe上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。
back_flavor: Inexplicably, the wood parts in a small clearing where a sundial sits in a circle of grass.

flavor: You'll have to repurpose several of your supplies to explore here.
name: Field of Chasms
text: [action]如果Field of Chasms上沒有恐懼：所有位於本地點的調查員從手牌中丟棄總共1[per_investigator]張支援卡。在Field of Chasms上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。
back_flavor: The tall grass forms rings around rocky openings in the ground, each leading down several yards.

flavor: Scaling the top of the mound will take no little amount of skill.
name: Mound of Crags
text: [action]如果Mound of Crags上沒有恐懼：所有位於本地點的調查員從手牌中丟棄總共1[per_investigator]張技能卡。在Mound of Crags上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。
back_flavor: A large hill rises out of the woods, covered on all faces by a network of stony outcroppings and ledges.

flavor: Fully exploring the valley will take quite a bit of maneuvering.
name: Narrow Valley
text: [action]如果Narrow Valley上沒有恐懼：所有位於本地點的調查員從手牌中丟棄總共1[per_investigator]張事件卡。在Narrow Valley上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。
back_flavor: This part of the wood sinks in a deep crevasse, scarcely big enough for a single person to walk down the center of.

flavor: Your attention is finally drawn to the Baker, who shouts without restraint and waves his arms wildly. "It's a Snark! Callooh! Callay! Our quarry is finally in sight!" The Baker's confirmation sounds too good to be true. Seeing as you've scoured the rest of the Tulgey Wood, however, if a Snark can be found here at all, then the Baker's proclamation might be believed.
name: The Baker's Trail
text: 強制 - 如果正好有1個沒有恐懼的地點：將本卡牌翻面並放置入場。

name: The Snark
text: 冷漠。生成 - 沒有恐懼的地點。 The Snark不能進入交戰狀態、不會受到傷害、不會被擊敗。

flavor: "The Snark has cut and run," the Butcher declares, "We've sent it packing, and so it must have returned to its pack." You don't recall anything about Snarks being social creatures, but you are drawn to a nearby grove by a jumble of strange sounds.
name: The Butcher's Trail
text: 強制 - 如果正好有2個沒有恐懼的地點將本卡牌翻面並放置入場。

flavor: The Butcher's detour passes by a hollow tree occupied by a variety of agitated creatures.
name: Lonely Backwoods
text: [action]如果Lonely Backwoods上沒有恐懼：查找遭遇牌堆和棄牌堆，找出並抽取1個沒有湧動關鍵詞的敵人(如果有3到4位玩家，改為2個敵人)。在Lonely Backwoods上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。

flavor: "I tailed the Snark, but mine fell flat," the Beaver grumbles, holding its flat tail, "Its own tail must be frought with danger." The woods are already filled with danger, but at the Beaver's insistence, you proceed toward a shadowy and isolated valley.
name: The Beaver's Trail
text: 強制 - 如果正好有2個沒有恐懼的地點將本卡牌翻面並放置入場。

flavor: The Beaver's directions lead to a particularly dark and dismal chasm.
name: Lonely Backwoods
text: [action]如果Lonely Backwoods上沒有恐懼：查找遭遇牌堆和棄牌堆，找出並抽取1個沒有湧動關鍵詞的詭計(如果有3到4位玩家，改為2張)。在Lonely Backwoods上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。

flavor: "The Snark resists all attempts at bribery," the Banker muses, "and therefore must be found at the bank of a river." You doubt the connection, but the watery footprints you find along the river are proof enough to continue the chase here
name: The Banker's Trail
text: 強制 - 如果正好有2個沒有恐懼的地點將本卡牌翻面並放置入場。

flavor: The Banker's pursuit ends at the banks of a dangerous series of river rapids.
name: Lonely Backwoods
text: [action]如果Lonely Backwoods上沒有恐懼：所有位於本地點的調查員花費總共3[per_investigator]資源。在Lonely Backwoods上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。

flavor: "The Snark must be somewhere deep and lonely," the Barrister speculates, "Or it would have answered the summons I sent it." You're not certain of the Snark's ability to read at all, but the strange noises emanating from a nearby cavern give reason enough to search it.
name: The Barrister's Trail
text: 強制 - 如果正好有2個沒有恐懼的地點將本卡牌翻面並放置入場。

flavor: The Barrister's course winds through a claustrophobic series of tunnels.
name: Lonely Backwoods
text: [action]如果Lonely Backwoods上沒有恐懼：查找你的牌堆和棄牌堆，找出並抽取1張弱點。在Lonely Backwoods上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。

flavor: "We must search both high and low," the Broker declares, "but let us start low for the sake of our stock." Though the premise is flawed, this still leads you toward soft mud and bent plants that betray the passage of some creature very recently.
name: The Broker's Trail
text: 強制 - 如果正好有3個沒有恐懼的地點將本卡牌翻面並放置入場。

flavor: The Broker's track treads over marshy ground that severely limits your options.
name: Rough Hinterlands
text: [action]如果Rough Hinterlands上沒有恐懼：所有位於本地點的調查員從手牌中丟棄費用總共為3[per_investigator]的卡牌。在Rough Hinterlands上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。

flavor: "It's taken our cue," the Billiard-Maker bemoans, dusting off his hands, "and so it will want chalk to dust the tip, from somewhere rocky, I presume." His theory seems far-fetched at best, but you can't deny the trail of white powder leading down the rocks.
name: The Billiard-Maker's Trail
text: 強制 - 如果正好有3個沒有恐懼的地點將本卡牌翻面並放置入場。

flavor: The Billiard-Maker's chase requires you to bridge a vast canyon by whatever means you can.
name: Rough Hinterlands
text: [action]：如果Rough Hinterlands上沒有恐懼：檢定任意技能(3)。這次檢定難度+1[per_investigator]。如果你成功，在Rough Hinterlands上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。

flavor: "No arrangement could be made to satisfy the beast!" the Bonnet-Maker despairs, "If it refuses a bonnet, then it must be indoors!" You hold your tongue at the notion, but the echoes of some strange beast from a secluded cave cause you to reconsider.
name: The Bonnet-Maker's Trail
text: 強制 - 如果正好有3個沒有恐懼的地點將本卡牌翻面並放置入場。

flavor: The Bonnet-Maker's path leads to the entrance of a deep and eerie cave.
name: Rough Hinterlands
text: [action]：如果Rough Hinterlands上沒有恐懼：檢定[willpower](2)。這次檢定難度+1[per_investigator]。如果你成功，在Rough Hinterlands上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。

flavor: "We've bared our soles in this chase," the Boots grumbles, staring at a hole in his shoe, "And yet the Snark hasn't worn out its own shoes. It must be climbing instead." The assumption doesn't seem quite right to you, though you spot movement atop a nearby cliff.
name: The Boots' Trail
text: 強制 - 如果正好有3個沒有恐懼的地點將本卡牌翻面並放置入場。

flavor: The Boots' route directs you to a small ledge atop a sheer cliff face.
name: Rough Hinterlands
text: [action]：如果Rough Hinterlands上沒有恐懼：檢定[agility](2)。這次檢定難度+1[per_investigator]。如果你成功，在Rough Hinterlands上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。

flavor: With the confidence he carries, one might assume that he knows what he's doing.
name: The Bellman
text:
你+1[willpower]。
[reaction]在有卡牌效果將要使你失去任意數量的資源時，消耗The Bellman並對其造成1點傷害：你忽略該效果失去資源的部分。
[reaction]在有卡牌效果將要使你丟棄任意數量的手牌時，消耗The Bellman並對其造成1點恐懼：你忽略該效果丟棄手牌的部分。

flavor: You've never seen something so frumious before.
name: Bandersnatch
text: 獵手。生成 - 離所有調查員最遠的地點。 如果Bandersnatch在敵軍階段中移動過，其不攻擊。 強制 - 在有調查員進入Bandersnatch的地點時：其準備、交戰並攻擊該調查員。

flavor: This one looks particularly mimsy.
name: Borogrove
text: 湧動。獵手。冷漠。 強制 - 在將要對位於Borogrove的地點的另一個敵人造成任意數量的傷害時：改為對Borogrove造成該傷害。

name: Going in Circles
text: 禍害。 顯現 - 你必須選擇(以下一項)： - 在當前密謀上放置1個毀滅標記。本效果可能導致當前密謀推進。 - 從任意地點移除1個恐懼，然後從供應堆放置1[per_investigator]個線索到該地點上。

flavor: Desperate and in perpetual passion.
name: Jubjub Bird
text: 獵手。冷漠。 強制 - 當敵軍階段開始時，如果Jubjub Bird處於準備且未交戰的狀態：按玩家順序，其攻擊其所在地點的每位調查員。

name: Looking-Glass Swarm
text: 顯現 - 檢定[agility](3)。如果你失敗，將Looking-Glass Swarm放置入場，放在你的威脅區域。 你的攻擊不能造成超過1點傷害。 調查時，你不能發現超過1個線索。 [action][action]：丟棄Looking-Glass Swarm。

flavor: The only creature that could outgribe this loudly.
name: Mome Rath
text:
反擊。
如果Mome Rath的地點上沒有恐懼，其+2攻擊且+1點恐懼。

flavor: Gyring and gimbling away.
name: Slithy Tove
text: 獵手。警戒。 強制 - 在躲避Slithy Tove成功後：將其移動到一個連接地點，並將其準備。

flavor: 'One, two! One, two! And through and through!'
name: Vorpal Blade
text: [action]：攻擊。你這次攻擊+1[combat]。這次攻擊造成+1傷害。如果這次攻擊中抽出了[elder_sign]、[bless]、+1或0標記，你可以治癒1點恐懼或造成1點額外的傷害(自行選擇，如果你的目標有[[怪物]]、[[異形]]或[[Shadow]]屬性，你可以改為兩者皆選)。

name: The Jabberwock
text: 敵軍階段期間，The Jabberwock+1點傷害和+1點恐懼。 強制 - 當一輪結束時，Jabberwock與所有調查員解除交戰狀態，並移動到密謀牌堆旁(保留所有標記)，位於場外。
traits: Wonderland. 怪物. 異形. 精英

name: Claws That Catch
text: 顯現 - 檢定[agility](3)。如果The Jabberwock在場上，這次檢定難度+1，且獲得禍害關鍵詞。如果你失敗，受到1點傷害且失去2資源。

name: Eyes of Flame
text: 顯現 - 檢定[willpower](3)。如果The Jabberwock在場上，這次檢定難度+1，且獲得禍害關鍵詞。如果你失敗，受到1點恐懼且隨機丟棄2張手牌。

name: Whiffling Through the Wood
text: 顯現 - 如果The Jabberwock在勝利牌區，Whiffling Through the Wood獲得湧動。否則，如果The Jabberwock在場外，將其放置入場，放在你的地點。如果The Jabberwock已經在場上，對其所在地點的每個調查員造成1點傷害和1點恐懼，然後將其移動到你的地點。

name: Sibling Rivalry
text:
簡單 / 普通
[skull]：-1。如果冒險參考卡上有至少1[per_investigator]個標記，改為-3。
[cultist][tablet]：-2。如果冒險參考卡上的傷害和恐懼標記數量不相等，改為-4。
[elder_thing]：-2。如果你失敗，在冒險參考卡上放置1個傷害標記和1個恐懼標記。
back_text:
困難 / 專家
[skull]：-2。如果冒險參考卡上有至少1[per_investigator]個標記，改為-4。
[cultist][tablet]：-3。如果冒險參考卡上的傷害和恐懼標記數量不相等，改為-5。
[elder_thing]：-3。如果你失敗，在冒險參考卡上放置1個傷害標記和1個恐懼標記。

flavor: Acting on the Tweedles' orders, the cards and chess pieces clash with each other on every available point in the small wooded valley. At the rate this battle is escalating, the soldiers might actually kill one of the Tweedles before you can get the rattle.
name: Brother Against Brother
text: 強制 - 在[[Card]]敵人被擊敗時：在冒險參考卡上放置1個傷害標記(從供應堆拿取)。 強制 - 在[[Chess]]敵人被擊敗時：在冒險參考卡上放置1個恐懼標記(從供應堆拿取)。
back_flavor: With the slight shifting of the flow of combat, one of the soldiers gets an opportunity to storm the opposing hill and attack the dismayed twin on it.
back_text:
依據冒險參考卡上傷害和恐懼標記的數量，進行以下結算：
- 如果冒險參考卡上的傷害標記數量大於恐懼標記，且Tweedledum在場上：對Tweedledum造成1點傷害。
- 如果冒險參考卡上的恐懼標記數量大於傷害標記，且Tweedledee在場上：對Tweedledee造成1點傷害。
- 否則：對Tweedledum或Tweedledee造成1點傷害(在場上自行選擇)。
如果沒有通過此效果達成任何變化，移除冒險參考卡上的所有標記。然後，將本密謀翻回'a'面。

flavor: To end the pointless war between Tweedledum and Tweedledee and get that rattle, you're going to have to be creative, especially if you don't want to just kill one of them. Unfortunately, the massive amounts of cards and chess pieces recruited by the Tweedles are bogging down any plans you've devised.
name: Thinning the Ranks
text: 目標 - 如果場上沒有敵人，推進場景。
back_flavor: The twins' armies are almost as evenly matched as they themselves are. Every soldier of theirs that you cut down swings the balance of the battle in the favor of the other. However, with fewer soldiers blocking your movements, you can focus on figuring out how to bring an end to the battle.

flavor: As the battle drags on, the shadows initially banished by the rattle have begun to creep back toward the valley. You think on the childish personalities of the Tweedles and their old nursery rhyme, and you wonder if you can somehow focus the shadows to scare them out of their duel.
name: Scare Tactics
text: 目標 - 只有位於Overgrown Dell的調查員可以花費所需數量的線索推進場景。
back_flavor: At first it seems to be impossible to corral the shadows toward any specific part of the battlefield. However, on the sloped terrain around the battlefield, you find several fallen crow feathers that seem to draw nearby shadows toward them. You gather as many as you can find and collect them in the central valley. Within minutes, darkness begins to coalesce around the bundle of feathers and expand into an enormous shape. You take several steps back and cover your ears as the unearthly cawing of an unnatural crow screams out from the growing darkness. Tweedledum and Tweedledee stop barking orders at their minions and stand in frightened awe as the shadowy crow takes shape.
back_text: 將放在一邊的Monstrous Crow放置入場，放在密謀牌堆旁。

flavor: The Tweedles are already panicking, but still attempting to marshal their troops into action. With the shadowy crow bearing down on the battlefield, you have the tool you need to scare some sense into the twins.
name: As the Crow Flies
text: [action]如果你位於Tweedledum或Tweedledee的所在地點：談判。檢定[willpower]或[intellect](4)。如果你成功，在位於你的地點且未受調查員控制的故事支援上放置1點恐懼。 目標 - 如果Tweedledum(Terrified Twin)和Tweedledee(Terrified Twin)都在勝利牌區內，推進場景。
back_flavor: The Tweedles' nerves were failing them at the crow's appearance, but your added fearmongering sends them screaming and scrambling away from the battle. Without their leaders, the cards and chess pieces have no further driving force, and amble away from the valley harmlessly. Satisfied, you grab the last discarded piece of the rattle and turn your attention up to the shadowy crow.

flavor: The card and chess soldiers clash around you, obeying the orders of the twins. If only you could convince them to give up this ridiculous duel.
name: Overgrown Dell
text: [action]如果冒險參考卡上有至少2[per_investigator]個標記：檢定[willpower]或[intellect](4)。如果你成功，在冒險日誌裡的"Fragments of Alice"下方紀錄Reason。
back_flavor: Fallen logs and tangling weeds collect at the bottom of this small valley. This doesn't seem to deter the cards and chess pieces marching down from the opposing hills.

flavor: The bulk of Tweedledum's forces waits here for an opportunity to get into the fray.
name: West Hill
text: [action]談判：檢定[willpower]或[intellect](3)來說服1個Tweedledum的撲克牌放棄戰鬥。如果你成功，在冒險參考卡上放置1個傷害標記。如果你失敗，改為受到1點傷害。
back_flavor: Tweedledum stands atop this hill, looking angrily out across the valley toward his brother with his arms folded.

flavor: The bulk of Tweedledee's forces waits here for an opportunity to get into the fray.
name: East Hill
text: [action] 談判: 檢定[willpower]或[intellect](3)來說服1個Tweedledee的棋子放棄戰鬥。如果你成功，在冒險參考卡上放置1個恐懼標記。如果你失敗，改為受到1點恐懼。
back_flavor: Tweedledee stands atop this hill, sulking with his fists on his hips in a show of discontentment.

flavor: The cards raise their spears as you approach, guarding the ascent to the hill carefully.
name: Northwest Slope
text: 如果冒險參考卡上的傷害標記至少比恐懼標記多2個，你不能調查Northwest Slope。
back_flavor: The path up the north side of Tweedledum's hill is packed with cards all clamoring to get down into the central valley. You may not be able to get back down the way you came.

flavor: The card guards form into orderly ranks to prepare for their march down the slopes.
name: Northwest Slope
text: 強制 - 當一輪結束時，每個位於Northwest Slope的[[Card]]敵人治癒1點傷害。
back_flavor: The path up the north side of Tweedledum's hill is packed with cards all clamoring to get down into the central valley. You may not be able to get back down the way you came.

flavor: The chess pieces group together as you approach, carefully gauging your loyalty in this fight.
name: Northeast Slope
text: 如果冒險參考卡上的恐懼標記至少比傷害標記多2個，你不能調查Northeast Slope。
back_flavor: The path up the north side of Tweedledee's hill is swarming with chess pieces determined to join battle. You may not be able to get back down the way you came.

flavor: The horde of chess pieces rally here for their assault on the central valley.
name: Northeast Slope
text: 強制 - 當一輪結束時，每個位於Northeast Slope的[[Chess]]敵人治癒1點傷害。
back_flavor: The path up the north side of Tweedledee's hill is swarming with chess pieces determined to join battle. You may not be able to get back down the way you came.

flavor: The chess pieces mustered here seem particularly tense. It might be easy getting them to panic.
name: Southwest Slope
text: [reaction]在位於Southwest Slope的[[Chess]]敵人被擊敗後：直到本輪結束，本地點隱藏值-3(團隊每輪限制一次)。
back_flavor: The path up the south side of Tweedledum's hill is overflowing with cards rushing down to the valley. You may not be able to get back down the way you came.

flavor: The cards here bolster their forces to make up for any shortcomings on other parts of the battlefield.
name: Southwest Slope
text: 只要冒險參考卡上的傷害標記數量大於恐懼標記，Southwest Slope隱藏值+2。
back_flavor: The path up the south side of Tweedledum's hill is overflowing with cards rushing down to the valley. You may not be able to get back down the way you came.

flavor: The cards assaulting this slope aren't very cohesive. It might be easier than you expected to drop their guard.
name: Southeast Slope
text: [reaction]在位於Southeast Slope的[[Card]]敵人被擊敗後：直到本輪結束，本地點隱藏值-3(團隊每輪限制一次)。
back_flavor: The path up the south side of Tweedledee's hill is practically bursting with chess pieces, all eager to fight. You may not be able to get back down the way you came.

flavor: The chess pieces here have a more fortified position to balance any losses suffered across the valley.
name: Southeast Slope
text: 只要冒險參考卡上的恐懼標記數量大於傷害標記，Southeast Slope隱藏值+2。
back_flavor: The path up the south side of Tweedledee's hill is practically bursting with chess pieces, all eager to fight. You may not be able to get back down the way you came.

name: Tweedledum
text: [action]：對Tweedledum造成3點傷害。位於Tweedledum所在地點的任何調查員都可以啟動此能力。本行動不會觸發趁亂攻擊。 強制 - 如果Tweedledum上有1[per_investigator]個恐懼：將Tweedledum翻面並移動到勝利牌區。 強制 - 如果Tweedledum因為傷害而被擊敗：(→結局2)。

flavor: Just then flew down a monstrous crow, As black as a tar-barrel! Which frightened both the heroes so, They quite forgot their quarrel.
name: Tweedledum
Tweedledee
text: [action]：對Tweedledee造成3點傷害。位於Tweedledee所在地點的任何調查員都可以啟動此能力。本行動不會觸發趁亂攻擊。 強制 - 如果Tweedledee上有1[per_investigator]個恐懼：將Tweedledee翻面並移動到勝利牌區。 強制 - 如果Tweedledee因為傷害而被擊敗：(→結局2)。

flavor: Just then flew down a monstrous crow, As black as a tar-barrel! Which frightened both the heroes so, They quite forgot their quarrel.
name: Tweedledee
Monstrous Crow
text: 強制 - 當敵軍階段結束時，Monstrous Crow按玩家順序攻擊每位調查員(無視其所在地點)。調查員可以以團隊為單位花費1個線索來取消一次對任意調查員的攻擊。
traits: Wonderland. 怪物. Shadow. 精英

name: Caught in the Fray
text: 顯現 - 檢定[willpower]或[agility](5)。你失敗且每低於難度1點，丟棄遭遇牌堆頂部的1張卡牌。每丟棄1張[[Card]]敵人，受到1點傷害並失去1資源。每丟棄1張[[Chess]]敵人，受到1點恐懼且隨機丟棄1張手牌。

name: Contested Area
text: 顯現 - 將Contested Area疊加到你的地點。 強制 - 在敵人將要進入或生成在疊加的地點時：在該敵人上放置1個毀滅標記。 [action]：檢定[intellect]或[combat](4)。如果你成功，丟棄Contested Area。

flavor: The shadows are getting tired of lurking.
name: Dark Interference
text: 禍害。 顯現 - 查找遭遇牌堆，找出1個[[Soldier]]敵人。你必須選擇(以下一項)： - 將該敵人生成在一個[[Slope]]地點(如果可能，選擇無人地點)，並在該敵人上放置1個毀滅標記。 - 丟棄該敵人，然後受到1點傷害和1點恐懼。 在結算此效果後，混洗遭遇牌堆。

name: Gaining Ground
text: 顯現 - 結算成立的項目： - 如果Tweedledum上的傷害比Tweedledee上的傷害多：在冒險輔助卡上放置1點傷害，然後受到1點傷害。 - 如果Tweedledee上的傷害比Tweedledum上的傷害多：在冒險輔助卡上放置1點恐懼，然後受到1點恐懼。 - 如果Tweedledum和Tweedledee上的傷害數量相等：在冒險輔助卡上放置1點傷害和1點恐懼，然後受到1點傷害和1點恐懼。

name: Priority Target
text: 禍害。 顯現 - 如果場上沒有[[Soldier]]敵人，Priority Target獲得湧動。否則，將Priority Target疊加到場上的1個[[Soldier]]敵人。 疊加的敵人+1攻擊、+1躲避、+2生命值，並獲得[[精英]]屬性。

flavor: As good as new.
name: Tweedles' Rattle
text: [action]消耗Tweedles' Rattle：調查。這次檢定忽略所有會增加你的地點的隱藏值的效果。 [action]消耗Tweedles' Rattle：躲避。如果你的目標有[[怪物]]、[[異形]]或[[Shadow]]屬性，這次檢定你+2[agility]。

name: Fool's Mate
text:
簡單 / 普通
[skull]：-X，X為場上[[Chess]]敵人的數量(最多-5)。
[cultist][tablet]：-2。如果在攻擊或躲避[[Chess]]敵人中抽出此標記，再抽一個標記。
[elder_thing]：-1。如果你位於[[Shadow]]地點，改為-3。
back_text:
困難 / 專家
[skull]：-X，X為場上[[Chess]]敵人的數量。
[cultist][tablet]：-3。如果在攻擊或躲避[[Chess]]敵人中抽出此標記，再抽一個標記。
[elder_thing]：-2。如果你位於[[Shadow]]地點，改為-4。

flavor: Your arrival on the front lines spurs movement from the far side of the board. If any truce was maintained until now, the time for it has passed.
name: Opening Strategy
text: [[Chess]]敵人獲得獵手，以及"生成 - Seventh Row或Eighth Row。" 強制 - 在[[Chess]]敵人將要結算獵手關鍵詞時，請參考劇本手冊中的Chess Movement部分。
back_flavor: Your preparations to cross the center line have been carefully observed. The red pieces storm out from the darkened castle. You have noticed from the first attackers that the pieces still somehow obey what you would consider normal chess rules. Is the Red King still guiding their movements? Or is it such a core part of the pieces that they move instinctively?
back_text: 查找遭遇牌堆和棄牌堆，找出1張King's Shadow並將其生成在調查員隊長的地點。如果查找過遭遇牌堆，將其混洗。

flavor: The battle on the chess fields continues with increasing fervor. Red pieces flow out from the darkened half of the board with surprising speed to meet your approach.
name: Countergambit
text: [[Chess]]敵人獲得獵手，以及"生成 - Seventh Row或Eighth Row。" 強制 - 在[[Chess]]敵人將要結算獵手關鍵詞時，請參考劇本手冊中的Chess Movement部分。
back_flavor: The red pieces pause their fighting to bow and kneel as an imposing figure emerges from the shadowy veil. The Red Queen, her face somehow both hard and soft at once, gazes hatefully across the fields at you as power swells within her. Shadows pour from her robes, and she begins to mutate further. "Strike down the invaders!" she bellows, racing toward you with tremendous speed.
back_text: 如果the Red Queen不在場上或勝利牌區內，將她生成在Eighth Row。

flavor: As the Red Queen advances upon you, the shadows spread with the speed of a wildfire toward the white castle. Darkness begins to claw at the sky, and each piece of landscape appears like a blackened copy of itself.
name: File Occupation
text: [[Chess]]敵人獲得獵手，以及"生成 - Seventh Row或Eighth Row。" 強制 - 在[[Chess]]敵人將要結算獵手關鍵詞時，請參考劇本手冊中的Chess Movement部分。
back_flavor: The red army relentlessly presses back against your charge in a seemingly unending flow of soldiers. As they push back, the amassed shadows sweep past you towards the castle of the white chess pieces and crash against it like a tidal wave. Your fighting for conquest turns to a fight for survival as you flee the battlefield.
back_text: 為了擊退紅色軍隊，每位未被擊敗且未撤退的調查員受到1點肉體創傷。 (→結局1)

flavor: You can barely make out the silhouette of the Red King's castle amid the darkened clouds ahead of you. It will be quite an ordeal to make it across the ruined half of the chess board fields.
name: Across the Board
text: [action]：依照劇本手冊中的移動規則，移動1個未交戰的[[Chess]]敵人。 目標 - 在有調查員進入the Eighth Row時，推進場景。
back_flavor: Through the swirling darkness, you charge up the steps of the red castle and burst through the towering double doors. The Red King sits at the opposite end of a grand hall, seated languidly in a grand skeletal throne. He does not make any motion as you enter, though the shadows leaking out of his hooded cloak begin to pour with increasing volume.
back_text: 查看冒險日誌。如果the investigators went through the looking-glass，將放在一邊的The Red King(Obscure Overlord)生成在Eighth Row。否則，將放在一邊的The Red King(Tenebrous Tyrant)生成在Eighth Row。 如果the Red Queen不在場上或勝利牌區內，將她生成在Eighth Row。

flavor: The Red King utters no commands or cries of alarm, but his minions pursue you into the castle as the shadows try to blot the light out behind you. Your only recourse is triumph, here and now.
name: Absolute Pin
text: [action]：依照劇本手冊中的移動規則，移動1個未交戰的[[Chess]]敵人。 目標 - 如果The Red King被擊敗，推進場景。
back_flavor: You strike the Red King with every bit of courage you can muster, and all at once, the red pieces freeze and the shadows' advance halts. The entire area seems suspended in time for a moment before the king slips down out of his throne and splays on the floor before you.

flavor: The White King does his best to rally his pieces into action, but they largely ignore him.
name: First Row
text: [action]：撤退。"This is a losing game"。 [action]：治癒1點傷害和1點恐懼(每場遊戲限制一次)。
back_flavor: The majority of the white chess pieces cluster inside the white castle, hesitant but clearly worried as they gaze down towards the shadowy far side of the board.

flavor: The outer walls of the white chess pieces offer some protection against the attacking red pieces.
name: Second Row
text: [reaction]在你躲避敵人成功後，選擇並丟棄你的1張手牌：將該敵人移動到Third Row或Fourth Row。
back_flavor: The white chess pieces' fortifications end at this square. Beyond lies an open battlefield.

flavor: The third row is open and spacious, with many well-kept roads running through it.
name: Third Row
text: [reaction]作為第一個行動，在你移動到本地點後：移動到一個連接地點。
back_flavor: The wide fields are perfectly square, though dense hedge rows block your path to any other column of this chess board.

flavor: A white knight roams near the border of the fifth row, muttering to himself in confusion.
name: Fourth Row
text: 強制 - 在你翻開Fourth Row後：將放在一邊的The White Knight放置入場，放在本地點，並將2張放在一邊的Absent-Minded洗入遭遇牌堆。 [free]丟棄你牌堆頂的1張卡牌：將棄牌堆中另一張任意卡牌洗回你的牌堆(每輪限制一次)。
back_flavor: The sun shines down in scattered rays as the darkness from the far half of the board begins reaching across.

flavor: Your body seems to fight you with each step forward, as if your own shadow were pulling back on you.
name: Fifth Row
text: 強制 - 在你翻開Fifth Row後：翻開你的牌堆頂部的5張卡牌，抽取每張以此方式翻開的弱點。混洗你的牌堆。
back_flavor: A deep split in the field separates the fourth and fifth rows. Shadows churn at the bottom, making it uncertain just how deep it is.
back_text: 作為進入Fifth Row的額外費用，調查員必須以團隊為單位花費1[per_investigator]個線索。

flavor: Shadows coil in from the sides of the square, as if trying to hedge you in.
name: Sixth Row
text: 強制 - 在你進入Sixth Row後：檢定[agility](3)。如果你失敗，立刻結束你的回合。
back_flavor: The terrain grows rougher with each step you take into enemy territory.
back_text: 作為進入Sixth Row的額外費用，調查員必須以團隊為單位花費1[per_investigator]個線索。

flavor: You find it hard to keep your footing as you make your way across the dim landscape and through the broken defenses of the red chess pieces.
name: Seventh Row
text: 強制 - 在你翻開Seventh Row時：查找遭遇牌堆和棄牌堆，找出並生成1個[[Chess]]敵人，與位於本地點的調查員交戰。如果查找過遭遇牌堆，將其混洗。
back_flavor: The outer fortifications of the red chess pieces lie crumbling, though the many corrupted pieces still lurk within them.
back_text: 作為進入Seventh Row的額外費用，調查員必須以團隊為單位花費1[per_investigator]個線索。

flavor: The castle of the red king lies in ruins at the edge of a massive cloudy void, torn apart unevenly by hungry claws.
name: Eighth Row
text: 強制 - 只要本地點上的線索不超過1[per_investigator]個，作為調查本地點的額外費用：選擇並丟棄你的1張手牌。
back_flavor: A roiling blanket of darkness veils the final square almost completely.
back_text: 作為進入Eighth Row的額外費用，調查員必須以團隊為單位花費1[per_investigator]個線索。

flavor: The Cheshire Cat might be offended if you mention curiosity killing anything.
name: Distant Square
text: 顯現 - 在冒險日誌裡的"Fragments of Alice"下方紀錄Curiosity。 調查員不能進入Distant Square。 [free]如果The White Knight在Distant Square，對他造成1點恐懼：準備The White Knight，並將他移動到任意已揭示地點。在任意地點的調查員都可以啟動此能力。
back_flavor: You can spot chess pieces moving to this square out of the corner of your eye, but it seems a world away.
back_text:
調查員不能進入Distant Square。
[action]花費1[per_investigator]個線索：翻開Distant Square。調查員以團隊為單位，可以從任意地點啟動此能力。

name: The White King
text:
[reaction]在你執行抽取行動後，消耗The White King：抽取1張額外的卡牌。位於The White King所在地點的任何調查員都可以啟動此能力。
[reaction]在你執行資源行動後，消耗The White King：獲得2個額外的資源。位於The White King所在地點的任何調查員都可以啟動此能力。

name: The Red King
text: 警戒。 在調查行動期間，The Red King不能進行趁亂攻擊。只要Eighth Row上有大於1[per_investigator]個線索，The Red King+2攻擊，且獲得反擊關鍵詞。 強制 - 在調查員從Eighth Row發現任意數量的線索後：對The Red King造成等同於該線索數量的傷害。
traits: Wonderland. Shadow. Chess. Royalty. 精英

name: The Red King
text: 警戒。 在調查行動期間，The Red King不能進行趁亂攻擊。只要Eighth Row上有大於1[per_investigator]個線索，The Red King+2攻擊，且獲得反擊關鍵詞。 強制 - 在調查員從Eighth Row發現任意數量的線索後：對The Red King造成等同於該線索數量的傷害。
traits: Wonderland. Shadow. Chess. Royalty. 精英

flavor: "...all she remembers is, that they were running hand in hand, and the Queen went so fast that it was all she could do to keep up with her: and still the Queen kept crying `Faster! Faster!"
name: The Red Queen
text: 獵物 - [agility]最低的調查員。 你與The Red Queen交戰時，你不能啟動[free]能力或打出有快速關鍵詞的卡牌。
traits: Wonderland. 類人. Chess. Royalty. 精英

name: Discovered Attack
text: 顯現 - 將Discovered Attack放置入場，放在你的威脅區域。 強制 - 在你進入有敵人的地點，或有敵人進入你的地點後：在該敵人上放置1個毀滅標記。 [action]：檢定[willpower]或[intellect](4)。如果你成功，丟棄Discovered Attack。

name: King's Shadow
text: 冷漠。獵手。King's Shadow不能進入交戰狀態。 強制 - 在你將要離開King's Shadow的地點時：King's Shadow攻擊你。 [reaction]在你調查成功或從你的地點發現線索後：對King's Shadow造成1點傷害。

name: Overextended
text: 顯現 - 檢定[agility](3)。如果你位於[[Shadow]]地點，這次檢定難度+1，且獲得禍害關鍵詞。如果你失敗，受到1點傷害(如果你的地點有[[Chess]]敵人，改為2點傷害)。如果你失敗且低於難度至少2點，失去2資源。

name: Promotion
text: 禍害。 顯現 - 如果場上沒有[[Chess Soldier]]敵人，Promotion獲得湧動。否則，選擇1個[[Chess Soldier]]敵人，將Promotion疊加到該敵人。疊加的敵人得到+1攻擊、+1躲避、+1恐懼。如果疊加的敵人是Pawn，其得到額外+1攻擊、+2生命值、+1躲避。

name: Zugzwang
text: 顯現 - 將Zugzwang疊加到你的地點。 強制 - 在你將要離開疊加的地點時，你必須(選擇兩個不同項目)： - 受到1點傷害。 - 受到1點恐懼。 - 隨機丟棄1張手牌。 - 失去1資源。 強制 - 當一輪結束時，丟棄Zugzwang。

name: The White Knight
text: 位於The White Knight的地點的調查員在結算[[Chess]]卡牌的效果或攻擊、躲避或調查[[Chess]]卡牌期間，所有技能值+1。 [action]談判：將The White Knight移動到一個連接地點。 強制 - 當調查階段結束時，如果The White Knight處於準備狀態且位於Distant Square：將他移動到任意investigator的地點。

flavor: "There he goes! Right on his head as usual!"
name: Absent Minded
text: 湧動。 顯現 - 消耗The White Knight並將其移動到Distant Square。

name: Lucid Nightmare
text:
簡單 / 普通
